thread.title: Coach of Superbowl finalists Atlanta Falcons, Dan Quinn, inspired by All Blacks
thread.title_full: Coach of Superbowl finalists Atlanta Falcons, Dan Quinn, inspired by All Blacks

title: Coach of Superbowl finalists Atlanta Falcons, Dan Quinn, inspired by All Blacks
text:
Coach of Superbowl finalists Atlanta Falcons, Dan Quinn, inspired by All Blacks Last updated 18:24, February 3 2017 USA TODAY 
Unlike Steve Hansen, Dan Quinn's not shy of a celebration or two. 
Dan Quinn is a big fan of the All Blacks, all because of a book he read. 
The Atlanta Falcons coach gave a thumbs-up to "Legacy", a book that details some of the philosophies and strategies that have made New Zealand's national rugby union team one of the world's most successful sporting outfits. 
"I've studied rugby from tackling and it's been a driving influence on our leverage tackling, using our shoulder to tackle, keeping our head out," Quinn said. USA TODAY 
Atlanta Falcons head coach Dan Quinn says he's studied rugby's tackling techniques closely. 
"So my interest for rugby was already there, and then when I found out more about their culture, what they stood for, how they had long-term success for years and years."
